message.body: I just had ridiculous dream. You had come over to my mansion on Christmas for a Yule time barbecue. We hung out around the lake all night on my paddle boats. Before you left you gave me a sweatshirt that had a mouth and told me to feed it cookies. The end
I'm so glad you finally have a mansion and paddle boats! I miss u too, when are we hanging out?
Me too! My life has too long been missing paddle boats. I dunno, what's your schedule during the week?
They're like the bar for success. My schedule suuuuuxks, what about yours?
Six x's and and k? Damn. That's a lot of suck. I work Friday through Monday at the bar. Tuesday and thursday day I do filming in Kensington. Plus miscellaneous shit to do throughout the week.
Yeah, I wanted to tell u, that video is great! I'm so jaded, when I saw the title i thought it was like a comedy troop, and it was so refreshing to see sincerity. Good job!
The documentary stuff? You watched it? God, thank you! I kinda figured no one but my dad saw it.
Your father and I are very proud
Aw. You make me blush.
So your weekends are best?
Yupp
Hey, I may have free time this Sunday. Wanna go see Steve at karaoke?
I've got a cultish girls school ceremony on Sunday!
Sounds sexy.
It's totally sexy
So, no karaoke?
Not this week..but soon..Erin wants to hang too!!
Yes!
What are you doing next weekend? It's my bday
Oh yeah? I'm out of town until Friday night. Do you have any plans?
I think I'm going out saturday...but not sure where. I will let u know when I do!
Fantastic. Now I have to figure out what to get you for a present. Hmm. How do you feel about native Americans?
Whoa you are going to give me my own Native American? Is that ok? Did Romney already win or something?
Well, I was thinking a headdress or something. But I'm sure I could get you a little Indian if you want.
I promise to feed it everyday. If you get me any sort of feathered headpiece I would be really into it. Where are u until Friday?
I'm in South Dakota until Wednesday then down to Colorado.
You are all over the Midwest! Why?
Of course. And there's just bunches of natives running around! I just needed to get out of Philly for a bit. And this way I get to see my sisters. Which is always nice.
that sounds great! And you will be back in Philly just in time.
I get back Friday night.
Hey! Meg's birthday get together Saturday night at Rays, uh oh. Meet there around ten!! XO
Am I going to see you 2night?
Not if you keep spelling words with numerals!
1 d0nt kno what you m3an
I hate you.
But, yes. After I get finished at work I will be there.
Most excellent
On my way.
Run!!
Thanks for coming out Saturday!!!
Of course! It was really wonderful to see you again. I had a great time.
I had fun too, what I can remember!
Hahaha! Really? You didn't sent that drunk.
I didn't even notice that.
Even in rays, I practice discretion
I don't know if "discrete" is the first word I'd use to describe you.
Yeah I guess I was using the word ironically
